Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-0167 affecting package curl for versions less than 8.8.0-6
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-0167 affecting package curl for versions less than 8.8.0-6. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package curl is earlier than 8.8.0-6, affected by CVE-2025-0167
